thread.title: California Democrats Advance Bill Making California A “Sanctuary State”
thread.title_full: California Democrats Advance Bill Making California A “Sanctuary State”

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: California Democrats Advance Bill Making California A “Sanctuary State”
text:
11:52pm January 31, 2017 Do you like this article? 
I feel like I’ve written a hundred articles lately about what a mess liberals have turned California into. 
Here’s the latest example in case it hasn’t sunk in yet. 
From Fox News : 
Democrats in California have advanced a bill that would make California a “sanctuary state” for all illegal immigrants, according to reports . 
Lawmakers claim California Senate Bill 54 – which was approved by state Senate Public Safety Committee in a 5-2 party-line vote – is designed to protect illegal aliens from any crackdown by President Donald Trump. 
On “Special Report” tonight, William La Jeunesse reported that the vote was the first step in making California the first state to shield all illegal immigrants from deportation. 
“The bill restricts state and local law enforcement from cooperating or assisting federal immigration efforts, prohibiting the use of any state resources to investigate, interrogate, detain, detect or arrest persons for immigration enforcement purposes,” La Jeunesse reported. 
He said that federal officials say the proposed law “radically changes” existing protocols. 
That’s right. 
Sanctuary cities weren’t good enough. 
Time for sanctuary states. 
It is starting to look like California might be beyond the point of saving… LIKE this article?
